nodes.bodyText:
This approach is not correct.

you will create a new Single every time method close is called
you should create a new single for each response
isClosed may use the cf.isDone rather than this strange construct

commit.message:
ResponseCloser now supports Single

Signed-off-by: David Kral <david.k.kral@oracle.com>
